SELECT oi.id, oi.order_name, oi.repair_code, oi.order_code, oi.server_type, oi.money, oi.remark, oi.images, oi.status, oi.customer_id, oi.product_id, oi.staff_id, oi.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.phone FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.customer_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oi.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND oi.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderName},'%')
AND oi.status = #{orderInfo.status}
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY oi.create_date DESC
